text: Earth day is celebrated by most people in the world.
Plastic takes 450 years to disappear from the planet
If we don’t conserve water, we won’t have any clean water to drink!
Earth day is celebrated on April 22nd.
Turn off your tap while brushing your teeth and take shorter showers!
Water makes up up to 75% of our bodies.
Turn off the lights when you leave the space!
Throwing garbage in the ocean hurts the fish and other sea creatures!
Air pollution makes it difficult for us to breathe!
Planting trees gives us clean air to breathe
You can be a planet hero by giving your time to protect the planet!
